name: Maker World
description:
Hello!

My name is PhanK.

Me and my Friend Dev Cake created this game for fun.

It's inspired by old PSX and Sega Saturn games from the 90s.

It was also inspired by this one video I made a while back called 'Forgivable Chump'

We had a lot of fun making it and we hope you have fun playing it!

___________________________ GOAL

You've been locked outside your house!

You need to find a way back in by finding or getting a new house key.

CONTROLS EUse/InteractW.A.S.D or Arrow KeysWalk around.
